participant_2.background:
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
i m terrified of heights.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I enjoy listening to jazz while I fly my model airplanes.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! What's up?
I just got back from New Orleans. It was an amazing experience.
Oh wow! I've always wanted to go there. What did you do?
I went to Mardi Gras! It was so much fun. I also went to a lot of museums and saw some amazing architecture.
That sounds like a great time. I'm glad you had fun.
Thanks! I'm glad I went.
Do you have any other exciting plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about taking some jewelry design classes. I've always loved making things.
That sounds like a great idea. I love jewelry design too. It's so much fun to create something beautiful.
I know, right? It's so therapeutic.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to fly model airplanes. I find it very relaxing.
That sounds like fun. I've never tried it before.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will.
You should! It's a great way to relax.
Okay, I will.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
